channel.title: Black ops Unlock all glitch
channel.description:
Theres a glitch where you can have any gun/camo/(pro)perks at any level. I dont know if it will be around for much longer but its pretty useful if you just prestige and want 74u or commando or something.
*This is kind of poorly written but oh well, and if you need help with anything just post or pm.
Anyways, heres what you do:
- You need 2 people, the person that wants the gold guns and stuff has to get an invite from their friend, TO A THEATER LOBBY. - Your friend then switches very fast between theater and player lobbies - You should get a black loading screen after a while, when you do, tell your friend - Your friend has to quickly switch back or stop at theater lobby - You should then get an error message of some sort, press (A) and then (B) - You should be at the main menu, go to local, system link, create a class, go to the first class and go to camo's and hover over gold camo (but dont click on it) - Once you are at gold camo, tell your friend to back out of his theater lobby - You should then get another error message, press (A) and you should be at a player match - SWITCH LOBBIES to a private match and you can now create classes with ANY camo, perk, gun. - once your done just switch lobbies to a player match again or back out, it doesnt really matter.
THINGS TO TAKE NOTE OF: - Make sure you create the classes you need in the private match, because once you back out you will not have all the camo's and things unlocked, only what you had before - You get the pro perks by going to the perk you want and pressing (X) to enable pro perks.

item.title: Black ops Unlock all glitch
item.dc:creator: @kyled123 kyled123
item.description:
@kyled123 wrote:

Theres a glitch where you can have any gun/camo/(pro)perks at any level.
I dont know if it will be around for much longer but its pretty useful if you just prestige and want 74u or commando or something.

*This is kind of poorly written but oh well, and if you need help with anything just post or pm.

Anyways, heres what you do:

  • You need 2 people, the person that wants the gold guns and stuff has to get an invite from their friend, TO A THEATER LOBBY.
  • Your friend then switches very fast between theater and player lobbies
  • You should get a black loading screen after a while, when you do, tell your friend
  • Your friend has to quickly switch back or stop at theater lobby
  • You should then get an error message of some sort, press (A) and then (B)
  • You should be at the main menu, go to local, system link, create a class, go to the first class and go to camo’s and hover over gold
    camo (but dont click on it)
  • Once you are at gold camo, tell your friend to back out of his theater lobby
  • You should then get another error message, press (A) and you should be at a player match
  • SWITCH LOBBIES to a private match and you can now create classes with ANY camo, perk, gun.
  • once your done just switch lobbies to a player match again or back out, it doesnt really matter.

THINGS TO TAKE NOTE OF:

  • Make sure you create the classes you need in the private match, because once you back out you will not have all the camo’s and things unlocked, only what you had before
  • You get the pro perks by going to the perk you want and pressing (X) to enable pro perks.
